name: Run (itch) (K0STUR)
description:
Hello!

This is a rather old project I made a while ago testing out a concept of  retro rouge-like speedrunning game.

You spawn in a 4x4 grid area which is somewhat randomly generated, your objective is to run around and find an exit, pretty simple, there is a timer and hitting a wall will reset u back to start but time will keep running. 

CONTROLS
WASD -- MOVE
